item.title: How to Tell a Lie
item.description: You had to laugh. Claire McCaskill jumped on Twitter to announce she’d never met the Russian ambassador to the US. Before that, she jumped on Twitter to brag about being so damned important and vital that the Russian ambassador sought her oracle-like guidance. After people mocked and scorned her silly lie, Claire McCaskill made up more lies to cover the first lie. You know, like a liar. Senator McCaskill believes Jeff Sessions should resign for not telling a lie.
